job_tasks.phrase: The team handles complex challenges and works on innovative and often AI focused projects while controlling and directing other engineering teams, external partners and stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the general work of the team, which involves managing projects and directing other teams, indicating a software engineering focus on project execution and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: The role is essential in providing our audience a great experience every time they open the VIX app and will be key to developing industry-leading reliability, quality, and performance.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the goal of building and maintaining a high-quality, reliable user experience, which is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop software.
job_tasks.justification: This is a fundamental software development task, emphasizing the creation and building of software.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work on all aspects of software development including front-end, back-end, database management, and other integrations.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly lists core software development activities across the full stack, including integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, the 'research, prototype, and build' aspect, especially in an R&D context, can encompass model development, but it's more general software development unless specified.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase specifically mentions AI/ML driven systems, understanding video, and using LLMs and Vector databases, indicating tasks related to model development and application of AI/ML techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of innovation and rapid prototyping of solutions, which is a software development activity, albeit in an R&D context.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users.
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating prototypes into large-scale applications and collaborating with other engineers, which is a core software development and integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: You dive headfirst into challenges and have a problem-solving mentality.
You are comfortable with failing often and fast on the road towards a solution.
You evangelize software craftsmanship and operational excellence yet pragmatic to know when to incur technical debt versus 'doing it right'.
This is a fine balance in an R&D team.
You are confident yet humble enough to change your mind when new information presents itself.
You value open communication and are willing to give and receive feedback.
You are a self-starter, flexible and can adjust to shifting priorities.

profile.rationale: The role involves a significant amount of traditional software development (front-end, back-end, database management, integration, prototyping, working with other engineers on large-scale applications) which falls under Macro-Category A. Crucially, it also explicitly mentions researching, prototyping, and building AI/ML driven systems, understanding video, and using Vector databases and LLMs, which are specific to Generative AI tasks (Macro-Category B). The balance of these two categories, with a clear emphasis on GenAI technologies, points to a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines both software engineering responsibilities and specific AI/ML tasks involving LLMs and vector databases. The 'AI focused projects' and explicit mention of 'AI/ML driven systems' and 'LLM's' make the AI component clear. The confidence is high, but not a perfect 5, as the 'understanding video' aspect could imply more traditional CV/ML, but the context with LLMs and vector databases leans towards GenAI applications.
